text:
A distinguished family. A celebrity lifestyle. Days of scandalous rumors.
The 'Happy Prince', whose future was promised from birth.

—He enjoys playing such a role.
He has devoted his life to self-producing in that way.

To be a person, is to be either fascinating, or boring.
He is an entertainer, who does not hesitate to say that people are either one of the two.

'Art for art's sake', no further reason is necessary.
The pursuit of decadent and artificial beauty is the way of life Oscar has chosen.

That is why he writes plays.
As if to say that the embodiment of his own beauty should be created with his own hands.

What he seeks is the embodiment of a beauty that is unimaginable,
that cannot be reached even if it means to squander his family's fortune.

The fantasy born from words, or the acting on stage.
The fictional pleasure that can only be obtained from formless creations.

The sweet and stimulating scripts born from such a person
instantly captivated countless people.

And even he himself, the author,
is similarly intoxicated and absorbed.

He behaved as if he were the 'Happy Prince'.
Oscar had, has, and will continue to live that way—

Chapter 2:
A Playwright's Backfire

name: Oscar
text:
—I'll take the lead.
Thank you for your hard work today,
from your usual duties to emergency responses!

name: Oscar
text:
I've put as much, if not more, effort
into this theme park as I do into my plays.

name: Oscar
text:
As a small token of my gratitude for protecting it,
I've had the best course meal I can offer prepared.

name: Oscar
text:
I hope you enjoy it.
Now, please join me in a toast... Cheers!

Exchanging words of appreciation,
they clinked their glasses together.

On the table, there was a wide array of dishes,
from the wildly untamed to the elegantly arranged.

Today's special seems to be a steak of heart
so fresh it's still dripping blood.

name: Hogen
text:
To be able to have such a fine dinner while on duty,
I guess it's good to have a capable beloved disciple, right? Hahaha!

Hogen, who was sitting across from the fire department,
said and laughed.

name: Shennong
text:
That's what you say, but you are the one who
caught those slimes at an incredible speed, didn't you?

name: Yuma
text:
Yes, slimes I missed,
he, caught them all.

name: Yuma
text:
Beastman's, leaping ability, put to shame.
My eyes, cannot follow, movements.
Perhaps, 'Rule', ignore physics?

name: Hogen
text:
Now that's some impressive observation skills.
I wish Oguchi Magami would learn from you.

name: Yuma
text:
Oguchi Magami...
Perhaps, that person, police officer?

name: Hogen
text:
Yes, he's a trainee in the police dog unit.
He's a bit quirky, but he's a promising kid.

name: Yuma
text:
Police dog...!
That story, a bit, interesting!

name: Red Hood
text:
Do you like puppies, Yuma-kun?
There's a fire brigade wolf right here!

name: Oscar
text:
Animals often appear in my scripts too.
Swallows, for example... If you'd like,
you should come see our performance sometime.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It seems to be so, so I'm relieved too.
I was worried that I was being too nosy, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: Working with [Player], thanks to Shennong-sensei.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Working with [Player], I, bit less scared, than before.
Not, nosy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm glad to hear you say that.
I should give my thanks to [Player] and Cinderella-san too.

options.text: Isn't this turning into some kind of recruitment drive?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my apologies.
When I find a diamond in the rough, I just have to have it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know that feeling all too well.
When you miss an opportunity, the feeling of regret grows stronger.
As Hogen said that, he glanced at [Player] and the fire brigade patch on their jacket.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: —[Player], owner, [Player] is, my owner...

text:
The lively meal continues,
and only dessert is left of the course meal.

As the conversation winds down,
Oscar begins to speak in a formal manner.

name: Oscar
text:
Now, this will be communicated to all staff at a later date,
but we are planning a test launch of the fireworks.

name: Oscar
text:
I hope you'd enjoy it, and I'd appreciate it if you could
let me know if there were any problems.

name: Oscar
text:
We will be conducting a survey of all staff,
but it is faster to ask directly.

name: Oscar
text:
Once the test date is decided,
I'll contact you with the details.

name: Hogen
text:
Oh, this is quite a treat.
To have it all to ourselves, I feel like a nobleman.

name: Shennong
text:
—Wait a minute,
isn't this place underground?

name: Hogen
text:
That's why it's a test, right?
Right, our great theme park director?

name: Oscar
text:
That's precisely it.
Of course, we have taken safety measures.

name: Oscar
text:
But, as you may know yourselves,
there are things you won't know until you actually try it.

name: Oscar
text:
So even if it's safe,
there's a possibility that it may cause some stress to the visitors.

name: Oscar
text:
We've asked the fire brigade to verify the safety,
so we'd like everyone else to give us opinions as visitors.

options.text: We get to see it for free!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right!?
I'm super excited too~

options.text: It's work, but I'm looking forward to it.
Is there anything I can do?

name: Red Hood
text:
Regarding the fireworks,
we'll take it into our own hands.

name: Cinderella
text:
Verifying the safety of fireworks,
and doing so underground, requires specialized knowledge.

name: Cinderella
text:
It would be cruel to drill all that into you,
our newcomer.

name: Cinderella
text:
And with fireworks, it's not just the fire,
you have to be careful of the flow of people too.

name: Cinderella
text:
You should get a feel for the flow of the day.
...Well, it seems like that's still a few days away!

name: Yuma
text:
Fireworks... Only seen, in videos.
Seeing for work, feels quite strange.

name: Hogen
text:
Fireworks in person are great!
The vibrations go right through you.

name: Oscar
text:
Precisely! The smell of gunpowder accompanying the extraordinary,
the passing splendor, the fleetingness of each and every shot...
I want you to experience that in its entirety, yes?

name: Oscar
text:
Especially on the reopening day,
we're planning a fireworks display on a scale different from what will follow.

name: Oscar
text:
We'll examine the results from the test,
and make a final decision on whether to proceed.

options.text: I want to see it with everyone!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh my! Could it be, that I have let my excitement get the better of me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, it's certainly fun.
I believe it myself, that the author should be the one to have the most fun.

name: Oscar
text:
I hope you're looking forward to it, [Player].
I will always strive to be a man who does not betray expectations.

name: Red Hood
text:
Big fireworks, huh? I wonder what their reaction would be if I brought
them here and showed them together.

name: Shennong
text:
Do you have someone close to you?
From the way you say it, it seems they haven't been transferred to Tokyo.

name: Red Hood
text:
Yes, yes! The Little Red Riding Hood I ate before,
her grandma, and the hunter!

Once feared as the epitome of evil,
the 'Villainous Wolf' of the otherworld Tír na nÓg.

One day in the forest, such a 'Villainous Wolf'
met a girl wearing a red riding hood.

There was an insatiable appetite that could not be concealed.
So, he tried to deceive the girl.

name: Red Hood
text:
'I switched places with the grandmother and acted like her.
Well, I was found out, though?'

It is difficult to become a role, to the point of one's way of life.
'Acting', is like a mask made of glass, that shatters easily.

The wolf ate the girl and her grandmother.
But, the hunter cut open his stomach, and they were rescued.

And, the things stuffed inside
were replaced.

The villainous wolf did not notice.
The fairy tale that remains today does not tell the end in detail.

Because, fairy tales are entertainment.
The parts that are not fun— should not be told to human ears.

name: Red Hood
text:
You can't live your life hiding your true self.
Well, I guess that's the lesson to be learned from this story.

name: Oscar
text: ...Hmm.

options.text: To atone for that, you became a firefighter?
You don't look like a bad wolf, though.

name: Red Hood
text:
That's not it.
We just 'switched places', that's all.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Aah.
I wish I could have shown everyone the fireworks.

options.text: Teach, you stepped on a landmine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That was my fault.
I was just curious.
You don't have to force yourself to talk—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not your fault, Shennong-san... *sniffle*
It's my fault...
I'm the one who twisted the conversation in a weird direction...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That was my fault.
I was just curious.
You don't have to force yourself to talk—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not your fault, Shennong-san... *sniffle*
It's my fault...
I'm the one who twisted the conversation in a weird direction...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're so kind, [Player]...
Sorry, it's my fault for twisting the conversation in a weird direction...

name: Oscar
text:
Beautiful, Red Hood-kun.
I like those kinds of villainous actors.

name: Oscar
text:
I'm no philanthropist myself.
I live today by eating the flesh of other living things.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Reddy, we're on the job.
We've talked about this before, haven't we?

With a click of her boots,
Cinderella tells Red Hood.

name: Cinderella
text:
Don't put a damper on the party.
Regretting the past won't get you anywhere.

name: Red Hood
text:
Yeah... There's no point
in me lamenting of the past now...
*inhale*.

name: Red Hood
text:
Sorry, everyone!
I just get all mixed up sometimes.

name: Yuma
text:
Don't really understand, but in tough time,
good, to close, cage. Eventually, alright.

name: Oscar
text:
—Ah, you have a point, Yuma-kun.
You should sleep soundly and forget about it.

name: Oscar
text:
It's about time we wrap up, so
I suppose I should show you your accommodations.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ugh... Is it my fault?
Did dinner time end because of me!?

name: Oscar
text:
Of course not! I've also had myself a hand in
the hotel's interior design. I just can't wait to show you.

name: Oscar
text:
—Ah, but I have something to discuss
with the two of you, from first aid and security.
I shall contact you myself later.

After finishing their meal, [Player] and the others
are shown to the accommodation facilities open to staff.

And in preparation for the next day,
they each took a rest—

dialogue_after_selection.text: Although many staff members are staying there, the lounge is very quiet.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Oh, you're up early.
Did you get a good rest?
Cinderella took two drinks from the drink server nearby and offered one.

options.text: I'm glad I woke up on time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good morning, [Player].
You're right on time for the meeting.
Good job.

[Player] rushed to the meeting place.
Only Cinderella was waiting there.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—You're here.
You seem to have slept well after yesterday.
Being able to sleep no matter what happens might be a talent for a firefighter.

name: Cinderella
text:
Our main duty today is to be on standby.
They're apparently doing rehearsals with fire and explosives in several places.

name: Cinderella
text:
—So, when the time calls for it,
we have to be ready to rush over immediately.

name: Cinderella
text:
Reddy was asked to do another job,
and I don't know the details, but he'll be gone for about half a day.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, if it comes down to it, he'll probably move out too,
and if we can't get away, we'll just have to manage somehow.

name: Cinderella
text:
Let's take it easy until then.
I hear there's a classic all-you-can-drink otherworldly drink?

[Player], who was ordered to stand by,
heads to the standby area without meeting any other friends.

When they opened the door to the location indicated in the message,
an open space, unsuitable for a standby area, welcomed them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha! Sure, go swim to your heart's content.
If you drown, I'll save you, alright?

name: Cinderella
text:
That director Oscar, he's quite
the generous host, isn't he?

name: Cinderella
text:
Dealing with fires is our duty as firefighters.
We get thanked, but it's rare to be treated this well.

name: Cinderella
text:
I don't mind, though.
It's just hard to see what he's really thinking.
Like the people around me in the old days.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, I guess the same could be said for Reddy.
Now that we're buddies, there are things I can say, but...

options.text: He was crying so much, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, that's the one I was hesitant about.
Let me know what you think afterwards, won't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, you can even decide on the menu right away.
Reddy is indecisive because he's thinking about 'things other than himself'.

name: Cinderella
text:
Reddy had calmed down by yesterday.
It never lasts that long, so you don't have to worry.

name: Cinderella
text:
...He's so energetic now, but Reddy was different
when he first entered the firefighting academy.

name: Cinderella
text:
He thinks too much about everything but himself.
Even now, he sometimes gets stuck in that loop.
Like yesterday.

options.text: I want to help him, but...
I can't just force him to talk, can I?

name: Cinderella
text:
'I used to be just a wolf'.
That's the only thing he'll ever tell me.

—He is, to put it simply,
afraid of 'the self he was born with'.

name: Oscar
text:
Good morning, you two.
Did you enjoy the private lounge?

name: Oscar
text:
Ah, this outfit was prepared for the staff.
If you'd like one too, I can arrange it for you right away.

name: Oscar
text:
If there's anything else you've noticed,
please don't hesitate to let me know... So to speak.

Oscar, who appeared out of nowhere,
approached with a bow, mimicking a waiter.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, your straightforward words have a different flavor from the embellished words I create.

name: Cinderella
text:
For the director to pay attention to the standby fire brigade,
isn't that a bit too considerate?

name: Oscar
text:
You are all precious beings who protect my sweet ideals.
Even this would not be enough.

name: Cinderella
text:
I see?
Dare I say if our current conversation happen to have
a connection to the work you've entrusted Reddy to?

name: Oscar
text:
It seems a poor excuse is not needed.
Then, I will dare to say that it is so.

Oscar lightly tapped the floor with his cane
and began to speak like a monologue from a musical.

name: Oscar
text:
If you ask me, he's an actor who has become too immersed in his role,
and can no longer show his true self.

name: Cinderella
text:
You say that, having just met him.
How can you be so sure after just what happened yesterday?

name: Oscar
text:
Because I've had that experience myself.
And because I've seen many actors.

name: Oscar
text:
Fortunately, I'm an expert when it comes to directing performers.
I thought I could give him some guidance as well.

note: note to self: design special red dialogue box next time

options.text: You're up to something, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's true that I'm a scumbag with no interest in anything but lies and pleasure, but even I...
Even I have a human-like heart...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ahaha! How was that?
It's not as good as Christine's, but my acting does a pretty number, doesn't it?

options.text: I won't hand Red Hood to you...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's true that I'm a scumbag with no interest in anything but lies and pleasure, but even I...
Even I have a human-like heart...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ahaha! How was that?
It's not as good as Christine's, but my acting does a pretty number, doesn't it?

name: Oscar
text:
As someone who also wears a mask,
I'm sure there's something I can do.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, just leave it to me.
Nothing might change, or something might change.

As he said that,
Oscar traced his mask with his finger.

The mask that symbolizes him as a playwright,
and 'Red Hood' as a good wolf—

name: Oscar
text:
A tantalizing headgear that hides oneself.
The more you wear it and get drunk on the ideal,
the harder it becomes to let go.

name: Oscar
text:
The gap between the self one is hiding and the mask
is what the person wearing it knows best.

name: Oscar
text:
...Think of it as me meddling as my gratitudes for yesterday,
or as my ego, if you will.

name: Cinderella
text:
Your ego, huh...
If you say so, then I understand.

At Cinderella's answer,
Oscar's lips curled into a smile.

options.text: Well, I guess I'll go along with it.
Is there anything I can do to help?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, you're going out of your way to help?
Reddy really is blessed with a good junior.

name: Oscar
text:
When the time comes, I'll ask for your help too.
Well, I'll just have you do what's natural for you.

name: Cinderella
text:
You're being vague. But, even if it's for Reddy's sake,
please don't start a fire, okay?

name: Oscar
text:
How ridiculous! This place is a manifestation of my fiction,
and it's also a paradise for me...

name: Oscar
text:
—Since we're at it, shall I talk about my passion for the park?
I happen to have some free time for a while.

options.text: It's better than doing schoolwork, I guess.

name: Cinderella
text:
I have nothing else to do but stand by,
so if you're going to talk, I'll lend an ear.

name: Oscar
text:
Then, without further ado.
I talked a little about it yesterday, but I'm particular about the reality here—

Just as Oscar began to speak,
a notification sound rang from everyone's devices at the same time.

When [Player] also looked at their device's screen,
a message displayed: 'Suspicious intruder reported, evacuate to designated area'.

name: Cinderella
text:
This is...
What on earth is going on?

name: Oscar
text:
One misfortune after another... Hooray for misfortune!
Once you've fallen, the only way is up. I'll solve it myself!

name: Cinderella
text:
Wait, Director-dono.
Something smells fishy.

options.text: Is there something that bothers you?
Evacuate just for a suspicious person...?
What about Hogen and the others...?

name: Cinderella
text:
If it were just a normal suspicious person,
that old man Hogen himself would be enough,
without having to issue an evacuation order.

name: Oscar
text:
Perhaps they're intentionally
hiding some information?

name: Oscar
text:
For example, an incident so severe that
telling the truth would cause a panic, or something.

name: Cinderella
text:
...!
In an emergency, it doesn't matter if you're fire or security,
the one who can do it does it. Let's move, [Player]!

options.text: Give me 40 seconds, I need to prepare myself—

name: Oscar
text:
Heaven does not extend a helping hand
to those who do not act for themselves—

name: Oscar
text:
Shall we now unleash
my preparations for an emergency?

name: Oscar
text:
Come now, [Player], will you become a performer
who colors my sweet fiction with me—?

There is a story like this.
Once upon a time, there was a happy prince in a certain castle.

He lived happily and died happily.
Knowing only pleasure and beautiful things.

After that, a statue of the prince is erected in the town.
His whole body is covered in gold leaf, his eyes are sapphires, and his sword made of ruby.

However, once outside the castle, the prince could see the sorrow of the town.
The prince, by chance, meets a swallow and makes a wish.

Please take off my gold and jewels and give them to the people in need.
The swallow fulfills this, but finally meets its end.

The prince wishes to the weakened swallow,
and the prince and the swallow exchange a kiss.

As the swallow's life fades away,
the last thing left for the prince,
heart made of lead, shatters like glass.

Granting someone's wish can sometimes
result in hurting that person.

Like the swallow who peeled the gold leaf, the sapphires,
and the ruby from the prince's body.

And yet— even knowing that pain,
there are those who wish for what covers them to be peeled away.

Suddenly, information about a suspicious person
flows through the staff communication chat.

While still questioning the evacuation order,
Cinderella sprouts to action immediately—

—[Player] and Oscar also ran through
the park in pursuit.

note: in case you were confused, the prince was mummified (?) and his corpse turned into a statue

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Not bad, [Player].
Keep that up and get to the scene!

name: Oscar
text:
As expected of the fire brigade, I suppose.
I usually behind the scenes, so I don't think I can keep up...!

name: Cinderella
text:
Since it's a matter of urgency,
I won't wait, so fly on over!

name: Oscar
text:
I'll give you the shortest route,
so it would be a great help if you could stay within earshot!

Going against the flow of staff evacuating on contact,
they run through on Oscar's instructions.

There, also going against the flow,
a shadow of a beast heads towards [Player].

name: Yuma
text:
—[Player]!
As thought, something happened.

name: Yuma
text:
You, surely, would not, run away.
I, become your strength. Go together!

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm surprised. I thought it was pretty rare
for someone to rush into danger knowing it's there, like me.

name: Oscar
text:
If there's someone to lead the way, comrades will naturally gather.
Isn't that a classic development in fiction?

With Yuma joining, the group runs through the park.
Then, they hear something like a shout.

When they turn their eyes in that direction,
they see a crowd of people outside a facility a short distance away.

name: Yuma
text:
Lot of people, gathered, sitting...
Perhaps, taken hostage!?

name: Cinderella
text:
The security team isn't here yet.
In that case, I'll take care of it—

name: Red Hood
text:
Hey, hey!
Everyone, put your devices on the ground!

name: Red Hood
text:
If you try anything funny, I'll make you regret it.
Just do as I say, alright!?

As if his usual personality was a lie,
Red Hood shouted with a lively expression.

options.text: (Look at Oscar with a blank stare)

name: Oscar
text:
Oh my!?
This is an unexpected turn of events!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Isn't that a bit of a stretch!?
If you weren't in that position, I might have actually believed you.

name: Yuma
text:
W- What's, happening!?
Why, Red Hood, even though, scared.

name: Cinderella
text:
Yuma, you may be plenty knowledgeable about living things,
but you might need to study the human heart a little more.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Yuma, [Player],
I just noticed. Look over there.

In the direction Cinderella pointed,
there was a staff member holding a placard that said 'Training'.

name: Oscar
text:
Yes, this is a so-called surprise drill,
made to be close to the real thing.

name: Oscar
text:
Red Hood-kun is playing the role of a rioter,
and is 'appearing' in this drill.

name: Yuma
text:
Surprised...
So, what do I, do?

name: Cinderella
text:
...What to do? Nothing's changed!
It just happens to be a drill this time. That's all.

name: Oscar
text:
That's right!
A drill is, of course, a reproduction of an emergency situation.

name: Oscar
text:
In other words, you must act the same
as you would in a non-drill situation.

name: Oscar
text:
Now then, [Player], Yuma-kun,
if this weren't a drill, what would you do?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right?
If you're going to break in, might as well do it through the front gate.
I just love that about you!!

options.text: I probably wouldn't just run away.
Alright, I'll play along with you, Oscar.

name: Yuma
text:
If, real situation...
Yes, I, follow [Player].

name: Cinderella
text:
I was surprised to see a familiar face, though?
I'll take care of all of you. If you're coming, then come along.

name: Oscar
text:
Then I too shall take the stage as a rioter.
As the planner, I shall take responsibility!

name: Oscar
text:
The theme of this stage is...
You'll understand by the time the end credits roll.

name: Oscar
text:
As a scriptwriter, I will tell you the story
about protecting the pitiful hostages from the clutches of evil.
I, the newly added actor, will also add to your stage.

name: Cinderella
text:
A script, you say.
If it's a strategy, I'd say we don't need one, but—

name: Cinderella
text:
—Doesn't that sound interesting?
I'm in, tell me how you're going to move me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha!
Nice, this is why I just love guys like you!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then, I protect, hostage.
[Player], go ahead, do not hesitate.

options.text: Leave the hostage rescue to me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I see, then I too shall dance flamboyantly.
A fleeting flower that blooms and scatters, will you accompany me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you're asking me to dance—
Hmph, I suppose I don't mind dancing with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Lots of, hostages.
I too, will help [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha!
Nice, this is why I just love guys like you!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then, I protect, hostage.
[Player], go ahead, do not hesitate.

name: Oscar
text:
OK, the cast is decided.
Now, for the rest—

[Player] and the others, led by Cinderella,
jumped out in front of the armed group led by Red Hood.

name: Red Hood
text:
Everyone, hands on your head,
sit down and be quiet—

name: Red Hood
text: <strong>—Eh??

name: Red Hood
text:
Ehh, ehh!?
What are you doing here, the evacuation is—

name: Suspicious Person
text:
Hey, you people,
don't come any closer!

name: Red Hood
text:
N-no, wait, aren't we supposed to
be dealing with the security team—

name: Suspicious Person
text:
Don't you care what happens
to this hostage!?

name: Red Hood
text:
...Th-that's right!
I won't let you have your way!

name: Oscar
text:
Greetings, suspicious people! Let me join your side.
—Now, let's restart the show. Let's take them head-on!

While Oscar drew attention with his exaggerated tone,
Yuma, who had circled around, approached without a sound.

—Like a beast's hunt,
he intended to apprehend the suspicious person guarding the hostage.

name: Yuma
text:
—Now, everyone, run.
I, deal with them!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good acting, [Player]!
It's almost as if you're really out for blood—
You are!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Counting on you, [Player].
After, everyone out, I, help you too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Fast!!
And, your sword pressure is amazing!
If I didn't have my old bad wolf intuition, I would have been done for!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good acting, [Player]!
It's almost as if you're really out for blood—
You are!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Alright, then everyone,
are you ready to surrender?

name: Suspicious Person
text:
Hey, Red Hood!
Let's use these guys as replacements for the hostages who escaped!

name: Red Hood
text:
(Ah, this feels good!
Rampaging like this is—)

name: Red Hood
text:
(B-but it's just training, so it's necessary...!
And everyone but me is really into it!?)

name: Oscar
text:
Go all out, Red Hood-kun.
Don't hesitate, tear off your everyday mask!

name: Red Hood
text:
...I'll make you regret getting in our way.
You better prepare yourselves!!

name: Oscar
text:
That's it, that's it!
Now, I think I'll go on a rampage myself as well.

With Cinderella and Red Hood's fierce battle behind them,
Oscar and the Yatagarasu stand before [Player] and the others.

note: Yatagarasu (ヤタガラス): the fire brigade members / mobs / 2*s of this event

options.text: Sure you can do it, Oscar?
You're not good with physical language, are you?
I'll pay you back 100 times of my daily grudge!

name: Oscar
text:
I'm Oscar! My job is to cast roles,
surely fitting the Guild Master title of the Entertainers?

name: Oscar
text:
And I, am Knight Oscar!
How's that, don't I just look like a newcomer to our trope?

name: Oscar
text:
Come, [Player], let's have little a sword fight.
Would you be able to peel off my mask?
Battle Start

name: Red Hood
text:
To think you would defy the Wolf Lord...!
I'll devour every last one of you!

name: Cinderella
text:
You're so full of life, Reddy!
Let's have a contest of endurance to see which of us turns to ash first.

name: Red Hood
text:
'—Once upon a time, the wolf blew down the
little pig's house with a single breath'... *huff*!

As Red Hood spoke to himself,
the strong winds blocked the flames, of which he used as a wall.

options.text: I can't get close like this!
That story, I've heard it before...!

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, not bad, Reddy.
There are some things you can only understand by making someone an enemy.

name: Oscar
text:
I see, the wolf of Tír na nÓg,
the 'Rule' believed in as its legend as witnessed!

name: Oscar
text:
That very fairy tale,
is spun by us creators—

Oscar strikes the ground with his cane.
This stage is based on his script.

—This fire, this wind,
are all part of the script's direction, alongside the performers.

name: Oscar
text:
I'll have them become a
path worthy of my actors!

The performers follow the script.
The wind, the fire literally turned into a path for Red Hood and the others.

options.text: (Jump into the path surrounded by wind and fire)

name: Yuma
text:
Grrrr...
Guooooo!!!

name: Red Hood
text:
If I stop the wind, I'll be burned by the flames...!
This is the final highlight, gaoooo—!!

name: Cinderella
text:
To think I'd be a diversionary tactic.
This might be the first time we've had such a clear division of roles.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, in exchange for showing me a new side of Reddy...
I'll let you have the spotlight today.

Cinderella's diversion,
alongside Yuma and [Player]'s tag team.

With a coordinated battle,
they corner the side of the suspicious person.

name: Red Hood
text:
Yuma's movements, is that mine?
Are my movements... being copied!?

name: Yuma
text:
A real, wolf... Movements, studied.
And, a two against one, with [Player]!!

name: Oscar
text:
...Guh! Well, as expected—
I don't dislike being beaten to a pulp by you.

name: Hogen
text:
Alright, that's enough, capture complete!
Hahaha, I'm just here to sweep the remains, but it's still my job.

The security team led by Hogen arrives,
and the suspicious people are neutralized—

When the exercise to confirm the cooperation between
the security team and the first aid team was over,
the training ended as it was.

name: Shennong
text:
Honestly, I'd heard about the training itself,
but why are [Player] and the others participating...?

name: Shennong
text:
Couldn't you at least wait until the security team arrived?
...Though, I guess I can't say much since I was too slow to catch up.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, well, our dear medical officer. In the congestion after reopening,
we might not be able to rush over right away.

name: Hogen
text:
You're really reliable.
I should have you join the police academy... Just kidding.

name: Cinderella
text:
Haha... I'm glad to have reliable newcomers.
With a little more experience, you just might be able to dance with me?

name: Hogen
text:
Gaaah...
Cinderella, you're getting closer to them than I am!

options.text: Did I attack you too hard...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, no, not at all!
Are you alright, [Player]...?

name: Cinderella
text:
What's the matter, you're unusually reserved.
Did you burn out from what happened earlier?

name: Red Hood
text:
No, hahaha. I suppose so,
I got a little too heated...

name: Red Hood
text:
But then, did I go too far?
I couldn't really control myself back there.

name: Cinderella
text:
You did seem to have some spirit,
but you were more lively than I've ever seen you.

options.text: It was a little scary, though.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, really...?
Stop it, I'm the type to eat a meal that's set out for me...

name: Yuma
text:
You, really cool.
If, could have, a bit, your fur, later...

name: Red Hood
text:
Fur...? Well, if it's not my internal organs, I don't mind.
I'm relieved that I didn't make everyone feel bad...

name: Oscar
text:
Red Hood-kun, and everyone from the
firefighting academy, thank you for your hard work!

name: Oscar
text:
That was a magnificent performance on its own.
If you joined our troupe, you would surely make a name
for yourself as a great villain.

name: Red Hood
text:
Ah, thank you very much.
I'm happy to hear you say that, Oscar-san...

name: Oscar
text:
A villain on stage is not
necessarily the same for everyone.

name: Oscar
text:
And not everyone who goes on stage
is necessarily wearing a mask.

name: Oscar
text:
With that in mind,
could you tell me your thoughts on performing in my play?

After a brief silence, Red Hood looks around
at Oscar and the others around him.

name: Red Hood
text:
Was it all for me?
Did you go to all this trouble just for me...?

name: Hogen
text:
No, even as the director, I couldn't approve
of holding a training session just for you.

name: Hogen
text:
However, I was able to consult with him about having you and the troupe members
participate in a previously scheduled training session.

name: Shennong
text:
I was asked to give some advice on whether
there would be any negative psychological effects.

name: Shennong
text:
Although I didn't hear that [Player] and the other fire brigade members,
Yuma-kun, and even Oscar-san would be participating.

name: Oscar
text:
Ahahaha!
That was... I got carried away, you could say.

name: Oscar
text:
I talked a little with Cinderella-dono and [Player],
but it was just my ego speaking,
so please don't think too deeply about it.

options.text: I don't really get it, but it was fun.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]...
You're a bit like the 'Little Red Riding Hood' in that aspect.

name: Red Hood
text:
I think I kind of get what Oscar-san is trying to say.
I can't really put it into words yet, though.

name: Red Hood
text:
When I've calmed down, I'll talk to everyone,
so let me thank you again then.

name: Cinderella
text:
So, you're saying that the fact that I and [Player]
didn't evacuate was also part of your plan?

name: Shennong
text:
Forgive me for saying this, but I think
you two's actions are relatively easy to read.

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha! I'm speechless.
Well then, I guess we can call it a day?

name: Oscar
text:
I suppose so. Thank you, everyone.
My show's rehearsal is approaching, so I must be excused.

With that,
Oscar promptly leaves the scene.

Then Hogen and Shennong go to clean up,
and Yuma returns to his staff duties, each to their own role.

name: Cinderella
text:
I guess we'll go back to standby.
Reddy, are you coming with us?

name: Red Hood
text:
Yeah, I'm free after this,
so I'll join you guys.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Hey, you two,
I didn't really turn into a bad wolf, did I?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: If I were really angry, you'd be in a pile of ashes by now, Reddy?

options.text: You have a complex, don't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text: If I were really angry, you'd be in a pile of ashes by now, Reddy?

options.text: How dare you doubt your cute junior!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right, Reddy!
If you get too twisted, we'll both throw you into a pile of ashes, alright?

name: Red Hood
text:
Eek...!
O-okay, I won't doubt you anymore!!

name: Red Hood
text:
If you two say so, then yeah.
I'm happy. I was always scared of being watched—

name: Red Hood
text:
I'm sure Oscar-san saw right through me.
As expected of a playwright, he sure knows how to move people's hearts.

name: Red Hood
text:
Hey, hey, before we go back to the standby area,
why don't we get a drink?

name: Cinderella
text:
Actually, you can order as much as you want at the standby area.
It's a courtesy of the director.

In the midst of everything,
Oscar sent a strange look towards Red Hood.

And then— Immediately,
he turned his back and left.

options.text: You two, excuse me for a moment!

name: Oscar
text:
...Oh [Player], do you need something from me?
Or, did you notice that I was observing you folks earlier?

name: Oscar
text:
No, I was just looking at Red Hood-kun.
Did my usual behavior make me seem suggestive?

options.text: I want to know the behind-the-scenes of the acting guidance.

name: Oscar
text:
Standing and talking is a bit much.
Let's watch the rehearsal together.

name: Oscar
text:
Don't worry, I won't lie.
Of course, whether you believe me or not is up to you.

Led by Oscar,
[Player] goes to the indoor stage of T.S.L.

It seems to be a full rehearsal with the actual performance in mind,
and the actors were performing in an incomplete art set.

name: Oscar
text:
—This time, it's a challenging work, even for me!
As you can see, it's a silent play by a playwright.

name: Oscar
text:
With performances based on ballet, street performance, and rhythmic gymnastics,
I'm also thinking of using water and fire for the actual performance.

name: Oscar
text:
On the first day and the last day, and regularly
at other times, with the help of the CEOs of the Flaming Mountains,
that popular performer from the Tokyo Casino, 'Aigi', will also appear.

name: Oscar
text:
I'll prepare a special seat for you if you wish,
so please let me know anytime, [Player].

When the performers performed an acrobatic trick in cooperation,
Oscar nodded with satisfaction.

name: Oscar
text:
'A playwright who creates such a play must be
this kind of person—'

name: Oscar
text:
'—A sarcastic, cool, and scandalous gentleman
who uses slightly cheesy and elegant words.'

name: Oscar
text:
No one cares if it's true or not.
...Of course, that includes me.

name: Oscar
text:
There's only 'charming or not'.
And lies are— always charming.

name: Oscar
text:
Fiction is not reality, but reality is not fiction either.
'Man shall not live by bread alone'.

The source that gives birth to that fiction
is the sweetest, and—

The tantalizing mask created in this way.
Oscar lives by it, and wears it willingly.

name: Oscar
text:
Hiding his innate desires,
he plays a role designated to him.

name: Oscar
text:
As long as he is acting, he can get pleasantly intoxicated.
But once the drunkenness wears off, what's left would only be the pain.

name: Oscar
text:
That is, of course!
...A story about Red Hood-kun and his friends, yes?

name: Oscar
text:
Even if you don't notice while the pain is numb,
by the time you do, a cruel amount of time has passed while you were drunk.

As Oscar said that, he stroked his own mask
as if it was something terrifying.

name: Oscar
text:
After a life lived in fiction,
the 'time of doing nothing' in his real self rushes in.

name: Oscar
text:
The one who knows that difference best
is none other than the person himself, you see.

name: Oscar
text:
And there are not many who can continue to be drunk.
At least, Red Hood-kun is different.

name: Oscar
text:
In his case... What's important is on and off.
It would be good if there was a place where he could be off without being tense.

name: Oscar
text:
It would be even better if there was
someone who would accept him when he's off.
I wanted him to realize that, so I set the stage.

name: Oscar
text:
The reason I went that far for that?
Well, as I said, it's 'ego'. My ego, as a fellow being.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just between you and me!
Even I, who only tells lies, have an off-time of my own.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: My dear [Player], will you grace the end credits?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Just between you and me!
Even I, who only tells lies, have an off-time of my own.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: My dear [Player], will you grace the end credits?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, you really know me well!
Well then, could I ask you to stay with me until the end?

text:
The rehearsal ends,
and Oscar gives his critique and praise to the performers.

Then, the two of them left the theater together.
The scene outside was—

options.text: The sky is turning to dusk!
There are fireworks, so will it become night too?

name: Oscar
text:
Good timing, isn't it?
I had the time-of-day change effect implemented starting today.

name: Oscar
text:
It's designed to change from morning to night
at a regular cycle, four times the speed of reality.

name: Oscar
text:
Just by changing the time of day,
the atmosphere of this theme park also changes.

The gas lamp-style lights are lit,
creating an unrealistic atmosphere.

name: Oscar
text:
For a creator, there is no greater joy
than seeing their fiction become a reality.

name: Oscar
text:
In that sense, this theme park is
more than just a job to me.

Oscar suddenly veers off the path
and opens the door of the structure in front of him.

What was thought to be one of the art sets was,
inside, like a VIP room.

name: Oscar
text:
—Well then, [Player],
in this paradise of mine, will you join me in my off-time?

name: Oscar
text:
This is a private area, hidden from outside view.
Here, will you peel off my mask and accept me?

options.text: How much of this was planned?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll leave that to your imagination!
To be honest, I can't quite distinguish it myself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: —Whether this realization of my ideal is as expected, or a dream come true...

options.text: Okay, I'll go along with you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm happy, [Player].
Then, let us both surrender ourselves to this fleeting pleasure.

options.text: Don't you have the courage to take it off yourself?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ah, that's right.
My true self might be surprisingly cowardly.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm weak when people peek under my mask.
...I'm the type who falls in love easily.
As Oscar said that, he gently placed his hand on his mask, took a breath, and—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I can't take this off myself.
So— I want you to take it off, my dear swallow.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: —Then this time for sure, let's have a romance scene before the end credits, shall we?

text:
To define is to limit.
So there's no need to define whether this is fiction or not.

However, this is not
the final work for Oscar.

Up until now, it was just a prelude before the opening.
The real performance of his play is now about to begin—
